resources.string: Keep an eye on your loved ones!
Arkangel allows you to monitor your childs positions in real time!
Adding a child to your list haven\'t been easier, you\'ll just have to create a profile and then enter the generated code to your child's phone
You can add a list of locations from which you\'ll receive notifications whenver your child enters or leaves them.
The locations history being stored will start reminding you whenever you forget doing a daily routine task
Whenever your child is lost he can ask you for direction and you can show him the way to his destination
